  • Field Details

    • gson

      private static final com.google.gson.Gson gson
      Stores the generated Gson object used for serialization and deserialization of objects. This value is generated at application launch using the createGson() method.
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • createGson()
      • getGson()
      • Gson

  • Method Details

    • getGson

      public static com.google.gson.Gson getGson()
      Provides the Gson object for serialization and deserialization.
      Returns:
      Gson object, specified in createGson()
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • gson
      • createGson()

    • createGson

      private static com.google.gson.Gson createGson()
      Creates a Gson object with modifications required for use in the project.

      Modifications:

      • Excluding transient values. This allows for specification of values that should not be serialized, either to save space or to prevent excess connections.
      • Use of custom Serializers and Deserializers:
        • Time class (Serializer, Deserializer)
      Returns:
      Completed Gson object for use in the project
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • Gson
      • GsonBuilder
